pullrequest.title: use stl meshes for collision, issue #364

content.raw:
Indeed. Let's get a bit more of testing on this and we will roll out a quick patch release for 3.1.1.

3.1.0 was launched today and won't get this in, but the plan is to release as soon as we have a proper testing for chnages in this pull request and probably very few others.
content.html:
Indeed. Let's get a bit more of testing on this and we will roll out a quick patch release for 3.1.1.

3.1.0 was launched today and won't get this in, but the plan is to release as soon as we have a proper testing for chnages in this pull request and probably very few others.
